item.title: 2018 Ctfzone Piggybank
item.description: Piggy-Bank (WEB - EASY) - 29 solves Hack some bank for me. First, we played a little bit with the website - there were index, register and login pages accessible for all the users, and Profile, VIP, For developers and Transfer pages for logged-in users. Profile page just showed the account balance, Transfer allowed moving your money to other accounts, and VIP was just saying that it’d reveal its secrets once we have 1’000’000 coins on our account (and we started with 110).
